entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The VBCSCompiler pipe name needs to normalize the path name #75714
    17.13

Closed

  • Test issue please ignore #75715
  • Compiler: thinks a local's type is that of another local #75710
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35504.12 #75712

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add wrapper service broker to allow for easy MEF consumption #75717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use absolute path for CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath #75713
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose code actions to Razor cohosting #75711
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not include source generated documents in related document results #75718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75720
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Recalculate if LSP inlay hint cache miss #75709
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectSystemProjectFactory.ConvertMetadataReferencesToProjectReferences_NoLock #75646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75716
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Modify Capacity growth rate to be linear instead of doubling on resize. #75708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
